movie-description: Bobby is about to abandon Tessa, but in a suicidal panic she persuades him to stay one last night and reenact the good old times in front of a video camera for posterity.
movie-short-description: Directed by Sarah Polley.  With Matthew Ferguson, Julian Richings, Kristen Thomson. Bobby is about to abandon Tessa, but in a suicidal panic she persuades him to stay one last night and reenact the good old times in front of a video camera for posterity.
